summary: A diffusion pipeline that transforms textual prompts into high‑resolution images and 3D representations using a latent diffusion model, incorporating upscaling, safety filtering, and extensibility through LoRA and textual‑inversion weights.
business_intent: Provide developers, artists, and enterprises with an out‑of‑the‑box solution for generating AI‑driven visual and 3D assets from text, supporting customization, safety compliance, and integration into creative workflows such as gaming, advertising, and design.
